body_html: Good question. I triple checked it locally and made sure MAJOR, MINOR, and PATCH were set. So long as the version is 1.0.0 we are good. I'll spot check some of the CMake output on the runs.

body: Good question. I triple checked it locally and made sure MAJOR, MINOR, and PATCH were set. So long as the version is `1.0.0` we are good. I'll spot check some of the CMake output on the runs.
